Text: Thanks but converting a MKV is a pain in the arse...

Perfect! I don't understand why anyone would dub a perfectly fine german speaking film, as in all the other uploads. Thats why I'm so greatful to this upload which has the original language only. Some preview pics from this movie:

http://www.shotpix.com/images/88445812605235398135.png

http://www.shotpix.com/images/53191569275065685475.png

There is plenty of subs out there if you don't know german, just google like this:

"Stalingrad.1993.720p.HDTV.x264-DON"


Thank You scenebalance :-)
